meanings.definition: In a different way or manner
meanings.sent1: She could alternatively take the bus to work.
meanings.sent2: You can choose to walk or alternatively ride a bike.
meanings.sent3: He decided to cook dinner alternatively by using the microwave.
meanings.sent4: The artist painted the landscape alternatively with bold strokes.
meanings.sent5: The students could alternatively study together to prepare for the exam.

meanings.sent1: If you don't like tea, you can alternatively have coffee.
meanings.sent2: You can alternatively watch a movie instead of going out.
meanings.sent3: She packed a sandwich alternatively in case she got hungry later.
meanings.sent4: The store offers a refund or alternatively store credit.
meanings.sent5: You can alternatively wear a sweater if you feel cold.

meanings.sent1: She loves ice cream; alternatively, he prefers cake.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy reading; alternatively, my brother likes playing video games.
meanings.sent3: He wanted to go out; alternatively, she wanted to stay in.
meanings.sent4: The team could win the game; alternatively, they could lose.
meanings.sent5: She might arrive early; alternatively, she might be late.
